website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a set for little kids, this is affordable and has several play functions.
pros: Includes a steering wheel and telescope for the lookout tower
Plenty of activity areas to keep kids interested
Decent quality on the wood for the price
cons: It will probably be too short for older children to enjoy

customer_reviews.title: Help!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a single mother who bought this and had it professionally installed. Even after leveling the ground and following directions exactly, the right side lifts from the ground when my small children swing. The monkey bars are not the height/width as described. Now I have to pay to disassemble for return! This is awful!
customer_reviews.author: kfaith

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Definitely need at least three people to assemble and a good drill
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The instructions are very clear and pieces all clearly labeled.
customer_reviews.author: debra sheffer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. I think it is great. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used the included instructions and put it together by myself with the exception of the slide. It took approximately 16 hours with no haste and little frustration. I prayed before starting. It supported me at one point and I'm 205lbs, though the boards were not happy. I don't think it could handle a lot more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Dmtigger

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for multiple features
customer_reviews.text: We just finished installing this product. It took 2 focused adults about 7-8 hours. The instructions were complicated, but that's fine - to be expected with this many pieces. The main thing is a really appreciate how many features it has, for the price that it is. We couldn't really afford a "deluxe" swing set and I feel this model does an amazing job with multiple features despite its value pricing. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Peck

customer_reviews.title: Check wood before putting together as a lot of pieces could be warped or bent.
customer_reviews.text: Well, It’s fine. I’m only 5-6 steps in and I’ve had to use many clamps to force the thing into place as half the pieces are warped. This will eventually cause splitting so I’m going to have to go and get cedar and mill it myself so it’s not forced together.
customer_reviews.author: G and P Cox

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great service
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE it. When we received the boxes there was a number/website you contact for professional installation for a fair price. We have it a call and they came out 2 days later and put it together for us. They were very professional. Made sure everything was level and square. They also made sure there were no exposed screws and everything was safe. They noticed our telescope had a crack so they went ahead ordered us a new one. When they were done they cleaned up all trash and left everything very clean. We were very impressed with the product and the services. I would highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: amccas01

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this- waited extra long for delivery due to the virus. Then found the first screw needed for assembly was not included. We finally received that and started assembly - we are on the 3rd step and we had 3 pieces of wood split. My husband said there is no way he was wasting his time and money on something that was such poor quality. We are sending it back and are very disappointed as is our little one. Lots of wasted time and money - save yourself and get a different set.
customer_reviews.author: CMG Marketing Man

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came with no instructions!!! Luckily I was able to go onto the backyard discovery page and find some. After about 10 hours total of putting this together so far everything is pretty good. One piece of wood is pretty split so I’m worried about how long it’s going to last and it’s one side of the monkey bars. The set up of the house is a little strange how they block off the entrance to the house after going across the monkey bars.. so we left the small boards off that go around the house area other than on the swing side and the table side.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It was about as easy to assemble as imaginable. Instruction say 10 hours it took me about 15 (also had 4 kids running around and interrupting) some of the hardware wasn’t as sturdy as I’d hope some screws were very easily stripped but overall seems pretty sturdy once out together. The hardware included both hand and drill bits for that fit all the hardware that wasn’t a regular Phillips making everything even easier. Would definetly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great playset
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive of buying a playset off amazon, but with all the stores being closed (at the beginning of the pandemic when I bought this) I didn't have much of a choice. I was happily surprised with the quality and sturdiness of this playset. I hired someone to put it together, so I can't speak to how easy it was. It took him about 6 hours all together to set it up. My kids have played on this daily for the past 4 months and it is holding up well. My daughter is 10 and it is big enough for her to still play on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stevic

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4-8 yr olds
customer_reviews.text: We spent a few hours a day working on setting this up, it took about 5 days. Instructions were not that difficult and we didn’t have any issues with missing parts or split wood. My newly 8 yr old(as of yesterday) is 64lbs and 4’6”(the size of an average 10-12 yr old) and is thoroughly enjoying the playscape, as well as my newly turned 4 yr old. It is perfect for their age range. The 8 year old can swing really high before it starts acting like it’s rocking/moving and he knows if it creaks to chill out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne & Adam

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Though the play-set says it is for the kids age group of 3-10 years, it is not. The swings that are provided with it are very dangerous for younger kids as it is not good enough to balance. My 3 yr old son fell couple of time and got hurt really bad. The product arrived defective. When we unpacked the items, we realized that the slide was scratched all over the place and the wooden pieces were chipped at several places. Not worth for the money spent and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Saleema

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and a good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I found the play set to be an easy build and of a higher quality than anticipated. Instructions were well written and illustrated and the numerous parts were well-labelled. The material quality is good (all cedar with most metal parts either anodized or powder-coated). I would expect this play-set to last 3- 4 years without too much maintenance beyond water sealing and keeping the bolts tightened. Perhaps if one accounts for replacement due to normal wear and tear on floorboards or wooden ladder rungs. Overall, we (and most importantly, our kids) are thrilled with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peacedotnik

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF TIME
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, save your money and buy something else. Paying about $600 for this swing set and taking two days to install it fully, it is not worth the time or money. First off, the wood is super thin, beyond thin, thin to the point that when my 29lb toddler gets on it the wood bends a little. It’s very unstable, from the ladder to the monkey bars, to well everything. The assembly on this is super easy and the instructions are great, however it is a waste of money. Also the only way to even get anything done about it is either to return it fully, or backyard discovery will send parts.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne W

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old and 2 year old love their swing set. It came in A LOT of pieces and wasn't the easiest to put together but the app and directions included were pretty good. We spend a good hour separating the parts by letters and numbers as well as the screws which made things easier when we actually got to the assembly part. We had a good bit of extra screws sooo not sure about that, but it's together and sturdy so we went with it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not very satisfied with overall quality but my kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely use the app over the book instructions. The book instructions can lead to some issues. Some of the wood pieces were not in great shape upon arrival. Two pieces of wood split as I was tightening bolts and no I did not over tighten them. Overall I'm not satisfied, if I could go back I would have gotten a different playset, but that is how I feel since I'm the one who put it together. My kids do enjoy playing on it. As to longevity we will see. The playset has only been up for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: horndog732

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality, littlest one will have a blast on it!
customer_reviews.text: Set this up by myself while watching my three year old. Took me 12 hours over the course of three day’s start to finish. The directions were excellent, each step just takes time. I was hoping this would be a bit sturdier as we also have an 11 and 13 year old. They will definitely not be able to play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Buswell

customer_reviews.title: Instructions lacking
customer_reviews.text: There are so many fasteners and so many different sizes of them. It was intimidating laying them out. Though this only took me couple hours Friday and all day Saturday to get this put together. My wife helped get the fasteners ready for each step. The BILT app was extremely helpful and I’m grateful my wife read the recommendation in another review. It’s a nice play set for my daughter and we are grateful to have it for her to enjoy during this time.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing Set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and it's a great blend of functional, versatile and useful. Son loves it and so far about 2 months in everything is still sturdy and strong. Definitely use the app it recommends to build. I was able to put it together in about 10 hours overall, not too awful. Keep very close attention to the holes when putting things together, had to flip some stuff around mid build but it's a great swing set. Have had my brother-in-law swign on the monkey bars and swings (185 lbs) and no issues so far. I stay off it bc I'm fat and always nervous to break things
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hanauer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice playhouse for my son.. It was difficult to assemble though with so many parts. It took my husband 2-3 days to assemble on his free time. The instructions were not so clear and some wood slats dont have holes on them so you have to literally drill holes to fit the screws/bolts. But overall it is a good purchase. My son loves it so much!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyB

customer_reviews.title: Feels flimsy, but good to buld onto
customer_reviews.text: the wood creeks no matter what you do. My wife is 120lbs and is scared to sit on a swing. Its soft wood and the locking inserts just pull right through the wood. The monkey bars are a dead end, you would think they would go to the clubhouse part, but its blocked off. I plan to build on this however, so its a good base point t to build more activities off of.
customer_reviews.author: Maxk

customer_reviews.title: Need to have 3 people and someone just to read instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Most of it was simple to bolt up there are somw spots were the boards should be larger. The roof with the cover the pre drilled holes were so close the wood was broken had to replace. Made a bracket and larger board were the swing set hooks to main house.
customer_reviews.author: mima brunges

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: We bought this playhouse a few days ago and my husband assembled it on his own in about 12 hours. He used the BILT app and said it made it so easy. My kods who are 2 and 4 love it and have been playing on it daily. It's the perfect size and has everything they could need for a fun playhouse. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy kids during quarantine
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It does take a while to assemble. I recommend organizing your pieces and haven't help assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Papa

customer_reviews.title: Two people, one FULL day to put together
customer_reviews.text: We got it on sale or before the summer "boom" so it was a lot less expensive than it is now, in that case it's a total value for the money. The kids love it and play on it everyday, rain or shine. It comes with a LOT of extra bolts, so don't freak out.
customer_reviews.author: T & S B.

customer_reviews.title: Great play set!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! Took most of a day to build, but went smoother than we thought.
customer_reviews.author: brett wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Came in 2 boxes and delivered right on time. Used the BILT App to put it together and it made it A LOT easier! Took me two days to assemble, because I did it on my own. Nothing was missing and all the parts came properly labelled. It’s quite sturdy and my kids are loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality takes over 10 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Extremely low quality wood. Very light. Kept cracking as we assembled it. Literally 2000 pieces and screws and bolts and washers to assemble by hand. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine Playground
customer_reviews.text: We were overwhelmed when we first opened the box with all the pieces. After many days of a few hours at a time we were able to build it. Advice: Lay out all wood by letter and hardware by type. Work slowly through each step to make sure each piece is installed in the correct direction. You will need to drill several holes in slide. Make sure you have a quality drill for assembly. You will need 2 people for some of the steps. All in all we are satisfied with set. 1 and 3 year old are having fun with the set and it has an appealing design.
customer_reviews.author: L. Malekebu

customer_reviews.title: enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: if you follow instructions, this is easy to install, and your kids will get a great deal of enjoyment, just remember your buying a cedar wood product, so till its full assembled, some care is required. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Perez

customer_reviews.title: it is what it is for the money
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my kids..i have four of them a 12 year old 9 year old 5 and 2... i thought the wood would be thicker and more sturdy than it was...many pieces came split or in the hardware case completely missing...altogether it took three trips to the hardware store to get more skrews or bolts because a pack of hardware was missing...finally got it erected and it seems sturdy enough...the kids really enjoy it...would have given a better rating if wood was a little thicker and it contained all the parts.....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher mann

customer_reviews.title: Missing a few pieces
customer_reviews.text: Cheap wood, way over priced. Woods Breaks easily. Missing a J4 piece and Missing BOLT WH 1/4x1/2 (2 PLCS)
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I didn’t listen to the bad reviews. The swing set is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but easily broken
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful play set but the wood is so light and flimsy. The stairs are already breaking and when kids swing in it the ends lift off the ground. This would be much greater with heavier wood.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this swing set for our twin 3.5 year olds. They are loving it! It is good quality and very sturdy. I sometimes swing on it with them. Definitely a great purchase for the money. I have friends that bought very expensive swing sets that are not as nice as this. It did take quiet a while to assemble - roughly 8 hours for two very handy men but didn’t seem difficult. It’s just a lot. Overall, we are very satisfied with this swing set and look forward to lots of years with it.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Could be a bit sturdier but overall a nice playground.
customer_reviews.text: We just finished assembling today. For us, it took 2 evenings, a full Saturday and a few hours Sunday. As far as instructions, it worked out best that we followed the included booklet and also the virtual 3D instructions from the Built app. We did have to predrill several areas and some of the railings, you’ll have to measure and drill your own holes. The wood is nice, but not as sturdy as we would have liked. Overall, a very nice playground with lots of options! I personally like the look and the details are very cool.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shatkin

customer_reviews.title: Very dense building material not at all sturdy
customer_reviews.text: 3 star review because what I received could not possibly hold half as many kids as it pictures! It works for my 3 year old for now & even I'm able to sit in the top with her if I'm careful climbing up but then again I'm only 104lbs! Definitely isn't a sturdy set for older more heavier kids..itd be torn apart in a good days play!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Save your labor money. Use Bilt App!!!
customer_reviews.text: just finished putting this together. took 12 hours for one man job. NO PRO NEEDED. JUST FOLLOW DIRECTIONS ON BILT.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Bui

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This does take longer than the 10 hours listed for assembly, but the pieces are labeled well, so once you organize everything, it does go faster. My two year old loves this play set. We did switch out the swings for toddler swings, but the ones that come with the play set are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Freeman

customer_reviews.title: would no buy again
customer_reviews.text: instructions are not good, the download app did not work, the predrilled holes did not always line up, wood beam for top cover to thin, split when screwed parts together. took four adults 9 hours to put together. We all have good knowledge of how the work on things. Not a good buy....................
customer_reviews.author: robert mills

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but wouldn’t pay anymore than what I did for it...
customer_reviews.text: The wood is a little cheap, but it is a nice set and my 4 year old likes it. I will say that I paid $580 but no way would I pay more (seen a seller had for $900- not worth worth $900) but for $580 I can’t complain. Be careful when using a drill so you don’t split the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: decent playset
customer_reviews.text: It took along time to put together and the wood is not as sturdy as I would like. But once it was all together the kids loved it. And 2 adults were able to stand in tower without problems.
customer_reviews.author: holly north

customer_reviews.title: Great play structure
customer_reviews.text: A great play structure! My 3 year old loves it and I put in a baby swing and my baby loves that. If you're not great at putting these type of things together I recommend calling the number that comes with the product and have them assemble it
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Carney

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with the set that we chose. The app made the assembly as painless as possible. One adult did it in about 10 hours
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this swing set! Shipping took a little longer than expected, but were in the middle of the Covid pandemic so it was understandable. It took 2 people about 8 hours to assemble. The Wood seems like a good quality, and the swing set feels sturdy and well built. This was just what we needed while stuck at home for a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie McVay

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability and quality
customer_reviews.text: Product fell apart within 3 months of purchase, multiple support beams cracked and split making the play set unsafe for my 4 young kids to be able to play on. Extremely disappointed in my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Great set up. Exactly as pictured. Wood seems to be decent quality. It took my husband about 10 hours to set this up by himself.
customer_reviews.author: jennymonster21

customer_reviews.title: Small house, can’t hold too many kids in it
customer_reviews.text: Good playground. It took a few days with 2 people. Wish the house itself was a little bigger but overall great playground
customer_reviews.author: junpablo93

customer_reviews.title: Follow the weight limit!
customer_reviews.text: Very tedious to put together. It's probably going to last us a few years. We have larger kids ( 65- 80 lbs ) who have played on it and the whole thing shakes. Definitely not for bigger kids. Our smaller kids ( 20 - 45lbs) do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: A H

customer_reviews.title: Quality is what you pay for. Good for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: A few boards came cracked. Instructions were hard to get through. Very time consuming and that was with someone who assembles the higher quality sets for a living helping. The quality is what you pay for. It will do for few years it will be used.
customer_reviews.author: Leashapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The wood comes cracked and really dry now to return it you must take it apart which mine is half way put together. Then you can return it but the boxes are super heavy. And the Delivery process was already awful. Not worth the money or the waiting took 6 weeks to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Directions could have been a little clearer but we managed to get it together with what we received. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Fezer

customer_reviews.title: Easy inst6
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this set on April 15th, it arrived in perfect condition right on time yesterday April 24th. We layed the boxes out and went through all the pieces and did not have an issue setting this up. It took us 6.5 hours. This set is absolutely beautiful! The hardware is impressive, almost every hole is predrilled and the instructions were very clear. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for our 3 year old. It is small and not as study but great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing play structure for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this purchase. This play structure was a great price for every detail you get! My husband is very handy and it took him about ten hours to do by himself. But we expected that. The kids love it. One of the pieces came off on the first day but my husband got it back up. Overall super happy
customer_reviews.author: Libby Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and would reccomend to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy little swingset!!! Will work perfect for my three and two year old!! Was a bit of a bear to get together because we got a little confused but it all worked out! Took two days to build! One 7 hr day and another three to four hrs next day with four people working on it! Monkey bars and slide hardest part!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Titus

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in 5 million pieces not very good instructions and EXTREMELY cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobi Schlabach

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this it seems stable enough (my husband swung on it for a min) good for little ones
customer_reviews.author: Indisposed

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Enjoys!
customer_reviews.text: With four adults and one toddler, it took us nine hours to complete, start to finish. Highly recommend paying a little extra for someone to assemble. Very sturdy and great value for your money. Only complaint is the assembling!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Siegmann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter is 2 1/2 this is perfect for her. She loves it and definitely something she will be able to grow into!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Playset
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my granddaughter. A few people were involved in setting it up, and it did take the whole time 10-14 hours with breaks. Having a flat level surface was paramount to ensure it was built squarely. My granddaughter loves the swings and her parents added a few sun shades to help with the hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elena Parra

customer_reviews.title: 3D help is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived nice. 3D app for installation was awesome. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Great products alot bigger then I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: David Medina

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE FOR KIDS
customer_reviews.text: Wood is cheap It creaks and sways when you seing even with the stakes in the ground. Wood splits easy and just not safe for kids to be on. My son is 8 and weighs 65 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Good swing set made for younger children
customer_reviews.text: Swing set is perfect your younger kids I wouldn’t order it if you had any older then 8 the only complaint is the money bars don’t lead to anywhere
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH BURNETT

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good buy and a life saver now the kids have something to do. My girls are 6 and 8 and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: paula counts

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. It's super cute. Buy it for your kids. But get ready to WORK. They say 10 hours. Ha! More like an all day event if you're doing it right. Take your time. It's really a nice set that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Took husband three evenings after work to complete! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: megan newman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This swing set looks nice but it is cheaply made. Very cheap wood. We had it for like 2 months and it’s already falling apart. We have to keep tightening it. I wanted my kids to have something nice and fun. This isn’t it! 😭A waste of $650. It was also missing a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Request for seller to contact me
customer_reviews.text: Awning arrived with seams coming apart. Can seller please contact me to replace the awning. A lot of money was spent on this item would like it to have intact seams. Otherwise happy
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, but needs better safety features.
customer_reviews.text: Needs better safety features. When attempting to menouver the monkey bars, our granddaughter scissord the stair rung and had to be treated in emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Patty7654

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great swingset. Holds up well. Fairly easy to assemble with an extra set of hands. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: leighanne

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m completely happy with the finished product as well as my son. It took a day and half to build it. Instructions were easy to follow it just took a long time to put together, did it myself. It’s worth the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan T Matsuda

customer_reviews.title: The kids absolutely love it. No more having to go to the park.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this play set. It took awhile to get it all assembled but it was worth the wait. The kids lovery it. One of the best investment I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the stay at home summer and it's been a big hit. Great swing set and pretty easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softer Wood - Overall Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The directions were easy to follow for assembly however, the wood is soft and cracked in several places during assembly. I would however, recommend this swingset to others.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: This would be a zero if I could. Came missing parts and I cannot complete the installation. Manufacturer is unresponsive. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Nill

customer_reviews.title: Missing and defective parts
customer_reviews.text: Box was slightly ripped upon receiving it, I am missing 1 L shape bracket and so far had a couple defective screws.
customer_reviews.author: OCHunter

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: We love our new playset! Using the app made putting it together fairly easy. It took my husband and I about 8 hours. I would recommend having power drills.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah coughran

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in quality !! Would not recommend for any age.
customer_reviews.text: This set is very cheaply made. Would not recommend. It is not sturdy at all. save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pay someone to assemble lol
customer_reviews.text: Love this, and so does my daughter. Definitely it was worth the money during this trying time so that my baby can play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alot of fun for kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: My littles love this! Very fun playset for the money. Takes time to set up as it is in many pieces but we'll worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Bad materials
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this. We put it together and have only had it up for a month and the wood is already cracking and breaking. Very disappointed!

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery Beach Front All Cedar Wooden Swing Set
product_meta.description: With its large deck and colorful canopy, the upper fort will make your kids feel like they’re relaxing under a big beach umbrella, or sailing on the high seas in search of pirates using its steering wheel and telescope. The rock wall ladder and monkey bars provide safe and challenging options for a fun ascent to the top, and the 8-foot slide offers a quick and wavy descent back to the bottom. Try building castles and writing your kids names in the sandbox area below, and when they need a break, head over to the brightly colored awning and snack bar to cool off with a cold juice box.
feature_bullets: Large upper deck with ships wheel and telescope (no magnification)
Lower deck with covered snack bar & bench
Rock wall ladder and challenging monkey bars
3D interactive assembly instructions for this product are available through the free BILT app.
